page.title: 12A MUSLIM CHILD'S DAY
page.content: We worship in a{mosque.}There are rules to follow before we can go into the praying area. We mut take off our shoes then pray to {Allah.}There is a{ {Holy book}which we read called the { {Koran}and a nacklace of beads which help us to pray. this is called the{ {Mushafe.} You can pray in your own house but you must kneel on a prayer mat that is embroidered with a picture of the mosque.The carpet must be facing the mosque or{Mecca.}Men wear white cotton hats and women cover their heads with a scarf. We are not allowed to eat pork or ham because they come from a pig and we must not drink anything alcholic. The {Muslim}people have lived in the Laygate area of South Shields for many many years.
